title: Proteins before planets: How space ice may have created the 1st building blocks of life
description: "We used to think that only very simple molecules could be created in these clouds. But we have shown that this is clearly not the case."
content: "We used to think that only very simple molecules could be created in these clouds. But we have shown that this is clearly not the case."
